that was beautiful!

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:          Jeff,
 
I am sorry for your loss.
You know you have not really lost her, she just went on ahead to save you a seat.
 
bruce


  Bruce Halliday 




    
---------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: ghostchasingfool@...
Date: Fri, 28 Mar 2008 18:36:46 +0000
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Our deepest condolences!

      I wanted to express my deepest condolences to Jeff Rezman and his 
family. Jeff's grandmother passed away yesterday and although she is 
in a better place, it doesn't make the transition here on earth an any 
easier. 

You are in our thoughts and prayers!

Juli & Joel
